panels.description: Average Number of Connections that are being activated per second
panels.title: Connection Activation Rate (per Second)

panels.description: Average Number of Credentials issued per second
panels.title: Credential Issuance Rate (per Second)

panels.description: Average Number of Proof Requests verified per second
panels.title: Proof Request Verification Rate (per Second)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

panels.title: Connection Protocol Transition Times  (per Minute in Milliseconds)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

panels.title: Proof Request Protocol Transition Times  (per minute in Milliseconds)
HTTP Response Times (per Minute in Milliseconds)
Errors Raised by Aries HTTP Requests - (Issuer/Verifier and Holder)
Total Number of Failed HTTP Requests

targets.expr:
count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/connections/create-invitation httpCode:400"
  |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/issue-credential/send httpCode:400"
  |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:422"
    |= "is not a raw Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key"
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/connections/create-invitation httpCode:400"
  |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:422"
    |= "is not a raw Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key"
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/issue-credential/send httpCode:400"
  |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:400"
    |= "Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:400"
    |= "Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: database is locked."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:400"
    |= "Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint"
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:400"
    |= "Error when updating storage record value. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint"
[1m])

options.content:
- *1: Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection.
- *2: Internal Server Error
- *3: recipientKeys [...] is not a raw Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key
- *4: Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection.
- *5: Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: database is locked.
- *6: Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint
- *7: Error when updating storage record value. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint

panels.title: Total Number of Errors Reported through Events

panels.description: AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found.

targets.expr:
count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[10d])

panels.title: IV: Issue Credential

targets.expr:
count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[1m])
targets.legendFormat: AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found.

panels.title: Number of Errors Caught by Test Runner
